question: Match the following:
I. <katex>$Zn^{2+}$</katex>  i. <katex>$d^{8}$</katex> configuration
II. <katex>$Cu^{2+}$</katex> ii. colourless
III. <katex>$Ni^{2+}$</katex> iii. <katex>$\mu=1.73BM$</katex>
[cite: 438-445]
explanation: <katex>$Zn^{2+}$</katex> (<katex>$3d^{10}$</katex>) is colourless (ii). <katex>$Cu^{2+}$</katex> (<katex>$3d^9$</katex>) has 1 unpaired electron, so <katex>$\mu = \sqrt{1(3)} = 1.73$</katex> BM (iii). <katex>$Ni^{2+}$</katex> is <katex>$3d^8$</katex> (i). Match: I-ii, II-iii, III-i. [cite: 449, 452]
